TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowApplicationInstance extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Specifies information about a workflow application instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class supports the versioning and dynamic update functionality of Windows Workflow Foundation. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] workflow versioning, workflow identity, and dynamic update, see the following topics.
[Workflow Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=271561) Describes the workflow versioning functionality introduced in [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)].
[Dynamic Update](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271563) Describes how to update the workflow definition of a persisted workflow instance by using dynamic update.
[Using WorkflowApplication Identity and Versioning](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271564) Describes how to use <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowIdentity> to host multiple versions of a workflow side-by-side.
[Side by Side Versioning in WorkflowServiceHost](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271565) Describes how to host multiple versions of a workflow on a single endpoint.
[How to: Host Multiple Versions of a Workflow Side-by-Side](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271566) This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating a workflow definition, and hosting workflows using both the old and new definition at the same time.
[How to: Update the Definition of a Running Workflow Instance](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271567) This step in the [Getting Started Tutorial](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=271570) demonstrates updating persisted workflow instances to use a new workflow definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abandon() cil managed

Docs.summary: Causes the state machine to transition to the abandoned state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abandon(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed

Docs.param: The timeout for the abandon operation complete.
Docs.summary: Causes the state machine to transition to the abandoned state with the specified timeout value.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginAbandon (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginAbandon(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginAbandon (TimeSpan timeout, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginAbandon(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

Docs.param: The timeout that contains the reason for the abandon operation.
The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CanApplyUpdate (System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMap updateMap, out System.Collections.Generic.IList<System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.ActivityBlockingUpdate> activitiesBlockingUpdate);

.method public hidebysig instance bool CanApplyUpdate(class System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.DynamicUpdateMap updateMap, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.ActivityBlockingUpdate> activitiesBlockingUpdate) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the WorkflowApplicationInstance can apply update.
Docs.returns: if the WorkflowApplicationInstance can apply update; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the definition identity of the workflow.
Docs.value: The definition identity of the workflow.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndAbandon(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed

Docs.param: The IAsyncResult returned by a call to one of the BeginAbandon methods.

Docs.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the workflow instance.
Docs.value: The unique identifier of the workflow instance.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an object that provides access to the persisted state of the current instance of the workflow application.
Docs.value: An object that provides access to the persisted state of the current instance of the workflow application.
